byline.contributor: Richard Martyn-Hemphill reported from Tallinn, and Sophia Kishkovsky from Moscow.
byline.original: By RICHARD MARTYN-HEMPHILL and SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY

lead_paragraph: Russia’s Federal Security Service said it handed over an Estonian security officer detained by Russia last year in exchange for a former Estonian official who was arrested in 2012.

headline.main: Russia and Estonia Swap Prisoners Accused of Spying
headline.print_headline: Russia and Estonia Swap Prisoners Accused of Spying

snippet: Russia’s Federal Security Service said it handed over an Estonian security officer detained by Russia last year in exchange for a former Estonian official who was arrested in 2012.
